title: Avenged Sevenfold MVI [Music Video Interactive]
description:
This is the Avenged Sevenfold Self Titled album MVI, or Music Video Interactive

For those of you who don&#039;t know what an MVI is; it&#039;s basically a music CD with bonus features.

====================Content====================

Audio:

   1. "Critical Acclaim" ? 5:14
   2. "Almost Easy" ? 3:54
   3. "Scream" ? 4:48
   4. "Afterlife" ? 5:53
   5. "Gunslinger" - 4:11 
   6. "Unbound (The Wild Ride)"  ? 5:11
   7. "Brompton Cocktail" ? 4:13
   8. "Lost" ? 5:02
   9. "A Little Piece of Heaven" ? 8:00
  10. "Dear God" ? 6:33


Video:


    * The Making of Avenged Sevenfold
    * The Making of Avenged Sevenfold (Animated Short)
    * The Making of the Avenged Sevenfold Cartoon
    * Studio Tour
    * Producer for a Day




Bonus Content:

    * A Little Piece of Heaven (Animated Music Video)
    * Crossroads B-side (Song)
    * Making Of "Afterlife" Video
    * Preview of Wolfie&#039;s new rap album "Wolfin&#039; It Up" 
    * Future Avenged Sevenfold Updates (e.g. songs, videos, etc.)



====================Instructions====================

I found no easier way of ripping this; so I just ripped the whole DVD [which was around 7GB] into an ISO file. 

Simply get your virtual dvd/cd drive program [MagicDisc, Virtual Clone Drive, PowerISO, etc] and mount the ISO file. 

Once done, just double click the DVD drive; if it doesn&#039;t automatically start up. 
It takes a while to start up; and if your computer isn&#039;t very fast; I would recommend going to the Task Manager, and increasing the priority of AVENGEDSEVENFOLD.EXE.


====================================================
 

Enjoy.


PS. Repost this torrent, and I kill you.
